items.name: Garissa Modern Market & Craft Plaza
items.short_description: A bustling new complex showcasing local produce, traditional crafts, and vibrant textiles from Garissa and the wider Northern Frontier region. A true immersion into the local entrepreneurial spirit.
items.address: Kismayu Road, Opposite Garissa County Assembly, Garissa

items.name: Tana River Eco-Lodge & Conservation Centre
items.short_description: Opened to promote sustainable tourism along the Tana River, this centre offers guided nature walks, bird watching, and educational programs on riverine ecosystem preservation. Stay overnight in eco-friendly bandas.
items.address: Off Boni Forest Road, 15km North of Garissa Town

items.name: Northern Frontier Innovation Hub
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art facility fostering entrepreneurship and technological literacy among Garissa's youth. It offers co-working spaces, training workshops, and incubation programs for startups.
items.address: University of Garissa Campus, Off Garissa-Dadaab Road

items.name: Somaliland Park & Family Fun Zone
items.short_description: Garissa's newest public park, designed for family recreation. Features playgrounds, shaded picnic areas, and a small cultural performance stage, offering a safe and vibrant space for all ages.
items.address: Along Garissa-Modogashe Road, near Central Mosque

items.name: The Horn of Africa Cultural Gallery
items.short_description: Dedicated to preserving and showcasing the rich artistic heritage of the Somali people and wider Horn of Africa. Features rotating exhibits of traditional art, contemporary works, and historical artifacts.

items.name: Garissa Waterfront Promenade & Fitness Trails
items.short_description: A newly developed scenic walkway along a section of the Tana River, perfect for leisurely strolls, jogging, and enjoying sunset views. Includes outdoor fitness equipment and shaded seating.
items.address: Tana River Bank, Access via Riverside Estate

items.name: Dawa Spice Garden Restaurant
items.short_description: An upscale dining experience offering a fusion of Somali, Swahili, and international cuisines, with a focus on fresh, locally sourced ingredients. Enjoy your meal in a beautiful, serene garden setting.
items.address: Next to Garissa Primary School, Off B8 Road

items.name: Garissa Health & Wellness Centre (Public Wing)
items.short_description: While primarily a medical facility, its new public wing offers wellness workshops, health screenings, and a tranquil rooftop garden accessible to the community, promoting holistic well-being.
items.address: Near Garissa Referral Hospital, Off Ngamia Road

items.name: Unity Sports Arena
items.short_description: A newly inaugurated multi-purpose sports complex featuring a football pitch, basketball court, and athletics track. It hosts local tournaments and offers public access for sports enthusiasts.

items.name: Historical Garissa Photo Archive & Study Room
items.short_description: An essential new resource for understanding Garissa's past, housing a vast collection of photographs, documents, and oral histories. Ideal for researchers and anyone interested in the region's heritage.
items.address: County Library Building, Bula Iftin, Garissa
